examples: He hadn't completely regained his strength.
He was severely injured and never regained consciousness.
The team are struggling to regain last season's form.
He was determined to regain what his father had lost.

words: an attempt/a bid/an effort to regain sth
examples: He is making a bid to regain his World No 1 ranking.

words: a chance/an opportunity to regain sth
examples: a chance to regain the lead in the contest
